content: अव्यवस्थ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not fixed, moving, unstable; स्थलारविंदश्रियमव्यवस्थां <ls>Ku. 1. 33.</ls> {@--2@} Unlimited. {@--3@} Unsettled, indiscriminate; भंगं जयं चापतुरव्यवस्थं <ls>R. 7. 54</ls>; disorderly, irregular. --स्था {@--1@} Irregularity, deviation from established rule; किमव्यवस्थां चलितोऽपि केशवः <ls>Śi. 12. 36.</ls> {@--2@} An incorrect opinion given on a point of religious or civil law.
